trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Vero Beach
There were no other sightings in Vero Beach on or around January 3rd 2012
divs: sighting detailsi officially saw my first ufo!.... i was walking my dogs in the back yard, and i thought someone shot off a roman candle from across the water from the other neighborhood. it was a brilliant orange\amber orb with color flickering. it made no sound at all and was very beautiful. it was about 300-400 feet above me and i followed it till it disappeared to the east. a few seconds later another orb followed the same exact path rising from out of the tree line area across the water like the first one did. i couldn't get over how close it was and how quiet it was. i kept thinking it might be a helicopter with a spotlight, but the object was flickering\glowing and totally silent as it passed overhead and then faded into the east. i was very excited and thrilled when i was watching this event, i was not scared but amazed how brilliant and bright in color the object was. i kept squinting my eyes trying to focus on the object to make out what it really was, but the object was to bright.
Summary: Vero Beach Sighting...I officially saw my first UFO!.... I was walking my dogs in the back yard, and I thought someone shot off a roman candle from across the water from the other neighborhood.
